data.text:
@AnfieldWatch Well REDS we play the Russian’s tomorrow at Wembley…..we will show total solidarity for the Ukrainian People…..let’s hope all our players turn up. Then surely we will beat them. 🙏🏻💪🏻👍🏻👏🏻🇺🇦
#Ukrainian #UkraineRussiaWar #ChelseaFC #LFCFamily #LFC #solidarity #YNWA
@AnfieldWatch Fab, LFC fans celebrate like no others, covid denied the hero's of the last Premier league win a parade, but just wait it will be worth it...

Fabinho: “We know our fans will be behind us. Yes, that will make this final really special. We have to work hard, to try and press them and recover the ball, and with the ball to create spaces and make chances.”
